name: Jet Frog
description:
It was a dream-like frog who could not live anymore because the living area was contaminated. He tried to bounce him higher with his tongue. He wanted to climb the clouds to find a solution. Although the journey is very difficult, but he still insisted his dream.

How to play:
Click on the screen, the frog will use the tongue adsorbed in the dwell area above
Sliding the screen, the frog will use its tongue's elasticity to bounce itself higher
If the frog encounters dangerous things, or falls into the water below, then the game is over

Please note:
Frog tongue support time is limited, if the residence time will drop down too long

Let's start our adventure together!
